Well, let's count; One!

A rough estimation using Steam stats would give about 1M to 1.5M copies sold on Steam. I'd say up to 2.5M copies max. adding the direct KSP website purchases.

No idea how many people still play it though. Surprisingly enough, it has averaged a pretty constant 4k players since 2013, except for end-2014-beginning-2015 (Beta release) and May 2015 (1.0). That would suggest it has more active players than predicted, but less total copies sold.

I'm no statistician, so don't rely on these numbers for anything serious.
